#include<iostream>
#ifdef ONLINE_JUDGE
#	define gc getchar_unlocked
#else
#	define gc getchar
#endif
inline void fps(long long &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
	x = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57));c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
main()
{
      long long t,n;
      fps(t);
      while(t--)
      {
         fps(n);       
         if(n==1)printf("0\n");
         else printf("%lld\n",(n*n)/2-1);
      }
}
